mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, PRICE, MAIN_IMG_URL, DESC_IMG_URL, INGREDIENTS, MAIN_CATEGORY_CODE, SUB_CATEGORY_CODE, ANIMAL_TYPE_CODE, PROTEIN_CODE FROM PRODUCT WHERE MAIN_CATEGORY_CODE = #{main-category} AND (NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( NAME, PRICE, MAIN_IMG_URL, DESC_IMG_URL, INGREDIENTS, MAIN_CATEGORY_CODE, SUB_CATEGORY_CODE, ANIMAL_TYPE_CODE, PROTEIN_CODE) VALUES ( #{name}, #{price}, #{mainImgUrl}, #{descImgUrl}, #{ingredients}, #{mainCategoryCode}, #{subCategoryCode}, #{animalTypeCode}, #{proteinCode} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, PRICE, MAIN_IMG_URL, DESC_IMG_URL, INGREDIENTS, MAIN_CATEGORY_CODE, SUB_CATEGORY_CODE, ANIMAL_TYPE_CODE, PROTEIN_CODE FROM PRODUCT OFFSET #{page} ROWS FETCH NEXT 20 ROWS ONLY
SELECT ID, NAME, PRICE, MAIN_IMG_URL, DESC_IMG_URL, INGREDIENTS, MAIN_CATEGORY_CODE, SUB_CATEGORY_CODE, ANIMAL_TYPE_CODE, PROTEIN_CODE FROM PRODUCT WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT p.ID, p.NAME, p.PRICE, p.MAIN_IMG_URL, COUNT(*) AS ORDERED_CNT FROM MEMBER m JOIN PET pt ON m.ID = pt.MEMBER_ID JOIN "ORDER" o ON m.ID = o.MEMBER_ID JOIN ORDER_DETAIL od ON o.ID = od.ORDER_ID JOIN PRODUCT p ON od.PRODUCT_ID = p.ID WHERE pt.BREED_CODE = #{breedCode} AND MONTHS_BETWEEN(pt.BIRTH, #{birth}) BETWEEN -12 AND 12 GROUP BY p.ID, p.NAME, p.PRICE, p.MAIN_IMG_URL ORDER BY ORDERED_CNT DESC

SELECT p.ID, p.NAME, p.PRICE, p.MAIN_IMG_URL, COUNT(*) AS ORDERED_CNT FROM MEMBER m JOIN PET pt ON m.ID = pt.MEMBER_ID JOIN "ORDER" o ON m.ID = o.MEMBER_ID JOIN ORDER_DETAIL od ON o.ID = od.ORDER_ID JOIN PRODUCT p ON od.PRODUCT_ID = p.ID WHERE pt.MBTI = #{mbtiType} GROUP BY p.ID, p.NAME, p.PRICE, p.MAIN_IMG_URL ORDER BY ORDERED_CNT DESC
